answers.answer: Thanks, patsy10 for the update.  I'm a big fan of the trackers, I have ones for weight, mood, and exercise.  I find them helpful in monitoring my overall health.  I want to get a blood pressure cuff so that I can start tracking that, as well.What does the autoimmune tracker record?

Here is information on how to install and use the trackers.To view/install the trackers:Go to MyMedhelpGo to Tracker PanelScroll down to bottom of Tracker PanelClick on "add a tracker"Choose your tracker

question: MedHelp has added five new trackers for anyone who might be interested.Menstrual cycleMenopause TrackerBody Temperature TrackerAutoimmune TrackerDiabetes Tracker
title: Trackers
